'''Java Edition Beta 1.9 Beta 2''' is the [[developer version]] of [[Java Edition Beta 1.9 Prerelease 2|Beta 1.9 Prerelease 2]] (the second pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.0.0|1.0.0]]), which was captured in one of the screenshots taken by Notch while testing [[Hardcore]] mode.<ref>{{tweet|notch|119031614553587713|Proof: http://imgur.com/sejBR?full|September 28, 2011}}</ref>
